name: Shooting Star
description: Call a comet down from the constellations to blast an enemy, dealing 4067 Flame Damage to all enemies in the area, knocking them down, and stunning them for 2 seconds.  After impact, enemies in the target area take 1161 Flame Damage every 1 second for 11 seconds.  You generate 12 Ultimate for each enemy hit by the initial blast.
effectLines: You generate Ultimate for each enemy hit by the initial blast.
coefDescription: Call a comet down from the constellations to blast an enemy, dealing $1 Flame Damage to all enemies in the area, knocking them down, and stunning them for 2 seconds.  After impact, enemies in the target area take $2 Flame Damage every 1 second for 11 seconds.  You generate 12 Ultimate for each enemy hit by the initial blast.
rawDescription:
Call a comet down from the constellations to blast an enemy, dealing <<1>> to all enemies in the area, knocking them down, and stunning them for <<2>>.

After impact, enemies in the target area take <<3>> every <<4>> for <<5>>.

You generate <<6>> Ultimate for each enemy hit by the initial blast.
